title: (Establishment) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 297 of 2014)), shall be increased to 11
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Oversight and Audit
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Oversight and Audit 

Commission (Number of Members) Order 2023. 

Number of Members.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national oversight audit commission (number members) order 2023 number member

title: (Establishment) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 297 of 2014)), shall be increased to 11
heading: 2. The number of members of the National Oversight and Audit
text_raw:
2. The number of members of the National Oversight and Audit 
Commission (established by the National Oversight and Audit Commission 
(Establishment) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 297 of 2014)), shall be increased to 11 
members for the period of 2 years from 4 September 2023. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Housing, 
Local Government and Heritage, 

21 August, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [428] 3

title: (Establishment) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 297 of 2014)), shall be increased to 11
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This order increases the number of members of the National Oversight and Audit 
Commission (established by the National Oversight and Audit Commission 
(Establishment) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 297 of 2014)) to 11 members for a period 
of two years from 4 September 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [428]
